<h3 id="X31393">X(31393) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THE MIXTILINEAR INCIRCLES</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(a^3+(b+c)*a^2-(b^2+10*b*c+c^2)*a-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))  :  :
<br>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(a^3 + a^2*b - a*b^2 - b^3 + a^2*c - 10*a*b*c + b^2*c - a*c^2 + b*c^2 - c^3) : : 
<br>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; cos A - cos B - cos C + 5 : :
<br><b>
X(31393) = 5*X(1)-2*X(1159) = 3*X(1)-2*X(15934) = 3*X(1)-X(18421) = 3*X(40)-4*X(3587) = X(1000)+2*X(30331) = 4*X(1001)-X(11525) = X(4900)-6*X(16857) = 2*X(7966)+X(11372) = 2*X(14563)-3*X(15933) = 4*X(15935)-X(16236)
<br>
X(31393) = (4*R - r)*X[1] + 2*r*X[3], 4*R*X[1] + r*X[40], 5*R*X[1] + (r - R)*X[46], 6*R*X[1] + (r - 2*R)*X[57], 8*R*X[3] + (r - 4*R)*X[40], 9*R*X[36] + (r - 5*R)*X[484], 5*r*X[40] - 4*(r - R)*X[46], 3*r*X[40] - 2*(r - 2*R)*X[57], r*(r + 6*R)*X[40] + 8*R^2*X[65], (r - 8*R)*X[40] + 12*R*X[165]<br>
</b><p>
Let A'B'C' be the mixtilinear incentral triangle.  Let A" be the trilinear pole, wrt A'B'C', of line BC, and define B" and C" cyclically.  The lines A'A", B'B", C'C" concur in X(31393).  (Randy Hutson, March 21, 2019)
</p><p>
X(31393) lies on these lines {1, 3}, {2, 3895}, {4, 12575}, {7, 28194}, {8, 3305}, {9, 519}, {10, 1058}, {11, 31434}, {12, 9614}, {21, 36846}, {63, 3241}, {78, 3890}, {84, 4313}, {90, 13606}, {145, X(31393) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 9819}, {1000, 3488}<br>
X(31393) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1, 6767), (3488, 30331), (4915, 9708), (9623, 1001), (11525, 9623), (11529, 1), (18421, 15934)<br>
X(31393) = (Aquila)-isogonal conjugate of-X(11034)<br>
X(31393) = X(1597)-of-excentral triangle<br>
X(31393) = X(9818)-of-Hutson intouch triangle<br>
X(31393) = X(9819)-of-anti-Aquila triangle<br>
X(31393) = X(11529)-of-5th mixtilinear triangle<br>
X(31393) = X(18494)-of-excenters-reflections triangle<br>
X(31393) = mixtilinear-excentral-to-mixtilinear-incentral similarity image of X(40)<br>
{X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): {1, 35, 1420}, {1, 40, 3333}, {1, 55, 3576}, {1, 165, 999}, {1, 1697, 40}, {1, 2093, 354}, {1, 3057, 7982}, {1, 3339, 5045}, {1, 3361, 7373}, {1, 3746, 3601}, {1, 4424, 3677}, {1, 5119, 57}, {1, 5255, 37554}, {1, 5697, 3340}, {1, 5902, 44841}, {1, 5903, 11518}, {1, 7962, 16200}, {1, 7987, 24928}, {1, 7991, 942}, {1, 10388, 37569}, {1, 10980, 5049}, {1, 11010, 3338}, {1, 11224, 50194}, {1, 15803, 3304}, {1, 18421, 15934}, {1, 30282, 1319}, {1, 30337, 9957}, {1, 30392, 25405}, {1, 31508, 13462}, {1, 37563, 46}, {1, 37610, 5269}, {3, 31792, 1}, {35, 13370, 3}, {40, 7982, 6766}, {55, 1319, 30282}, {55, 1470, 35}, {55, 5919, 1}, {57, 1697, 5119}, {57, 5119, 40}, {84, 5882, 9845}, {226, 30305, 31162}, {354, 8162, 1}, {388, 10624, 41869}, {497, 31397, 5587}, {944, 12705, 10864}, {997, 25439, 3158}, {1015, 31433, 9574}, {1319, 30282, 3576}, {1385, 49163, 37560}, {1479, 9578, 18492}, {1697, 37556, 1}, {2098, 37080, 1}, {2099, 3303, 3748}, {2099, 3748, 1}, {3057, 3303, 1}, {3057, 3748, 2099}, {3058, 5252, 3586}, {3085, 12053, 8227}, {3244, 12514, 6762}, {3295, 9957, 1}, {3304, 37568, 15803}, {3338, 11010, 5128}, {3476, 4304, 50811}, {3476, 10385, 4304}, {3576, 12703, 40}, {3579, 7373, 3361}, {3587, 15934, 57}, {3811, 3884, 15829}, {3898, 25439, 997}, {4342, 13405, 5603}, {5045, 12702, 3339}, {5049, 36279, 10980}, {5128, 11010, 40}, {5219, 30384, 38021}, {6767, 9819, 11529}, {7743, 31479, 7988}, {7962, 10389, 1}, {7991, 37551, 40}, {10056, 30384, 5219}, {11362, 40270, 938}, {12701, 15888, 9612}, {13462, 31508, 3}, {15934, 18421, 11529}, {18421, 30282, 30503}, {25405, 37606, 30392}, {37542, 37548, 1}, {37560, 49163, 40}, {37709, 41864, 10572}, {45711, 45712, 9957}<br>
